text: Alfred Biolek (born Alfred Franz Maria Biolek; 10 July 1934 â€“ 23 July 2021) was a German entertainer and television producer. Biolek was an honorary professor at the Academy of Media Arts Cologne. Biolek was born in Freistadt, Czechoslovakia. He helped produce some television specials for Monty Python. Biolek died on 23 July 2021 in Cologne, aged 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German entertainers Category:Television producers Category:German academics Category:German businesspeople
title: Alfred Biolek
